The only chemical entity found in the paragraph is "caffeine". It is a naturally occurring stimulant that is found in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, and fruits of some plants. It is widely consumed by humans in infusions extracted from the berries of the Coffea plant, in beverages such as coffee, tea, cocoa and soft drinks, and in medications for temporary relief of drowsiness or to relieve nasal congestion.
